Row.Text: +1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per Age on the Palace and City Halls.
+2 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per Age in the [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital for every [icon:RADIAL_TECH] Tech and [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Civic Mastery completed in an Age.
+2 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in Settlements for every Settlement under the [icon:SETTLEMENT_LIMIT] Settlement Limit.
+10 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per Age in Settlements with at least 8 Rural Population.
+2 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns per [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City. Repeatable.
